thread.title: World Cup 2026: Uefa will ask for 16 places for European teams - BBC Sport
thread.title_full: World Cup 2026: Uefa will ask for 16 places for European teams - BBC Sport

title: World Cup 2026: Uefa will ask for 16 places for European teams - BBC Sport
text:
Uefa will ask for European teams to be given 16 places at the expanded 48-team World Cup in 2026. 
European football's governing body will also request Fifa keeps European teams apart in the first-round group stage. 
An initial stage of 16 groups of three teams will precede a knockout stage for the remaining 32 for the new-look tournament. 
Uefa president Aleksander Ceferin said the requests are "realistic". 
More to follow.
